font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vi. （因为懒散）拖延： "a putting off from day to day,"
【例】 She procrastinated and missed the submission deadline. 她一直拖拖拉拉，导致错过了截止日期。
【记】 from pro- "forward" + crastinus "belonging to tomorrow," from cras "tomorrow,"
